data.prayer: Father, convict the 10,601 believers in Aurora to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aurora, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Aurora, Philippines so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Aurora, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Aurora, Philippines.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Aurora, Philippines, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Sindhi people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Aurora prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Aurora, Philippines. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aurora, Philippines has a population of 76,100.

We estimate Aurora has 10,601 people who might know Jesus, 58,624 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,875 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 58,624 people in the state of Aurora who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
